title: JSON Schema for JSDoc configuration files

recurseDepth.title: Specifying recursion depth
recurseDepth.$comment: Is used only if `jsdoc` command is invoked with `-r` flag

include.title: Input files paths
include.$comment: `-r` flag for `jsdoc` command will recurse in subdirectories of paths listed

exclude.title: Input files exclusion paths
exclude.$comment: With JSDoc ^3.3.0 may include subdirectories of include

excludePattern.title: Exclusion RegExp
excludePattern.$comment: By default, underscored files and folders are excluded

opts.$comment: The command line options take precedence over config file
opts.title: Incorporating CLI options

test.$comment: Equivalent to `-T` flag. Won't work if installed via NPM
test.title: Run tests

allowUnknownTags.$comment: If set to `false`, emits a warning. If set to an array, whitelists tags
allowUnknownTags.title: Unknown tags

items.$comment: ^3.3.0 two dictionaries: JSDoc and Closure Compiler
items.title: Dictionary

cleverLinks.$comment: If `true`, text of @link tag that is a URL will be rendered in normal font, else in monospace
cleverLinks.title: @link URL

includeDate.$comment: ^3.3.0 can be set to `false` to omit current date
includeDate.title: Showing the current date

layoutFile.$comment: ^3.4.0 can be set to custom layout file
layoutFile.title: Overriding layout file

outputSourceFiles.$comment: ^3.3.0 can be set to `false` to remove links to source files
outputSourceFiles.title: Generating pretty-printed source files

useLongnameInNav.$comment: ^3.4.0 can be set to `true` to use longhands
useLongnameInNav.title: Showing longnames

monospaceLinks.$comment: If `true`, all link text of inline @link tag will be rendered in monospace font
monospaceLinks.title: @link text
